text: Arthur Hiller Penn (September 27, 1922 â€“ September 28, 2010) was an American director and producer for movies and television. He directed many movies that got high marks in the 1960s, such as The Chase and Bonnie and Clyde. He returned to stage and television producing and directing in the 1990s. Penn was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He died in New York City at age 88 from congestive heart failure. ==References== Category:Movie producers from Pennsylvania Category:Movie directors from Pennsylvania Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:1922 births Category:2010 deaths
title: Arthur Penn
